panel.title: Top 5 Things You Can Do Now that You’re a Splunker

html.p: Congratulations on using Splunk! You’re on your way into turning your machine data into powerful operational intelligence and business results!
As you get started Splunking, get the most of our your software with our top 5 resources.

ol.li: Watch our Get Started with Splunk videos
Familiarize yourself with the Quick Reference Guide
Plan to join Splunk at our annual conference, .conf
Join a local Splunk User Group
Sign up for a Splunk education class

html.p: These resources will show you how to use Splunk to be more productive, profitable, competitive and secure.
